1039090.name: Transhaping - Soundtrack
1039090.description:
The full soundtrack for transgender awareness game, Transhaping. This soundtrack was produced by a collection of amazing musicians who we loved working with.
Files provided in mp3 and flac format.
Files located in steamapps/common/Transhaping/Soundtrack

Tracklist:

1 - Transhaping - Benny James
2 - Groove Protocol - Quinn Wolf
3 - Terminal Chroma - Quinn Wolf
4 - Lunar Campfire - Quinn Wolf
5 - Researching - Sophie Hamilton
6 - Researching (Stressed) - Sophie Hamilton
7 - Wondering - Sophie Hamilton
8 - Wondering (Stressed) - Sophie Hamilton
9 - All Eyes on You - Ashlyn Frost
10 - All Eyes on You - Ashlyn Frost
11- Waiting - Sophie Hamilton
12 - Waiting (Stressed) - Sophie Hamilton
13 - Tension - Sophie Hamilton
14 - Tension (Stressed) - Sophie Hamilton
15 - Playing Around - Oscar Joseph
16 - Playing Around (Stressed) - Oscar Joseph
17 - Patience - Oscar Joseph
18 - Patience (Stressed) - Oscar Joseph
19 - Home Sweet Home - Oscar Joseph
20 - Home Sweet Home (Stressed) - Oscar Joseph
21 - Adventures - Oscar Joseph
22 - Adventures (Stressed) - Oscar Joseph
23 - Taking a Stroll - Oscar Joseph
24 - Taking a Stroll (Stressed) - Oscar Joseph
25 - Experimenting - Sophie Hamilton
26 - Experimenting (Stressed) - Sophie Hamilton
27 - Omnihearted - Quinn Wolf
28 - Transmission - Quinn Wolf
29 - Shape of Me - Benny James

Musicians:

Oscar Joseph: Oscarjoesph on Band Camp
